problems.title: Longest Increasing Subarray
problems.description: Find the length of the longest increasing subarray.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers
problems.outputFormat: Print the length of longest increasing subarray

problems.title: Maximum Subarray Sum
problems.description: Find the maximum sum of any contiguous subarray (Kadane's Algorithm).
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Leaders in Array
problems.description: Find all leaders in the array. An element is a leader if it is greater than all elements to its right.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Rearrange Positive Negative
problems.description: Rearrange array so all negative numbers come before positive numbers (order doesn't matter).
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (array size)
Second line: n space-separated integers

problems.title: Missing Number
problems.description: Find the missing number in an array containing n-1 numbers from 1 to n.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: n (total count)
Second line: n-1 space-separated integers
